channel.title: LF AI RSS
channel.description: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

item.title: Briefing with LLM on Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:36:54
item.description: The content provided is a list of various news articles and job postings. One of the job postings is for a software engineer position at Etleap, a company that was part of the Y Combinator W13 batch. The article about malignant melanoma discusses how the disease uses molecular mechanisms to evade the immune system. Another article talks about how businesses with 500 or more users can opt out of Grammarly's AI training. There are also articles about various companies receiving funding, including Oladance, which completed a million-dollar angel round, and Datablau, which completed a B1 round of funding. Additionally, there are articles about the stock market, real estate, and technology companies. One article discusses Huawei's new real estate company, while another talks about how Starbucks is responding to competition from Luckin Coffee.
